alert.note: Alert for Henry; Jefferson; Keokuk; Van Buren; Washington (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 10 at 3:35PM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Henry, western Van Buren, southeastern Keokuk, southern Washington, Jefferson and northwestern Scotland Counties through 430 PM CST... At 335 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Richland to 7 miles northwest of Milton. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Richland around 340 PM CST. Pleasant Plain around 345 PM CST. Brighton around 350 PM CST. Other locations in the path of these storms include Coppock, Leando, Douds, Washington, Birmingham, Ainsworth and Crawfordsville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Henry; Jefferson; Keokuk; Van Buren; Washington
